name: DieSabers
description:
Welcome to Die Sabers!

Play with 2-4 players as you battle to be the last man standing. Shift between the second and third dimension as you try to block the other players.  Lightning rounds. Laser physics. 10+ arenas. 

What more could you want?

Controls:

Player 1

  • W/A/S/D = Move
  • Space = Shift Dimensions
  • Esc = Reset Score

Player 2 to 4

  • Left Thumb = Move
  • A = Shift Dimensions

Some notes:

  • You move in the direction you are facing. Think cars. Take some time to learn the controls.
  • The top winner/s hold the crown. You know who to take down. ;)
